content: hope you enjoy my latest design - a simple but sweet sleeveless baby bolero jacket sizes ~ newborn large preemie medium preemie & small preemie ~ ** also age 2 - 3 now added ** also ~ i am working on a version with long sleeves this design was inspired by a garter stitch baby jacket by the very talented theresa roberts i loved her cute little baby jacket and wanted to write a stocking stitch version in a range of sizes i hope i did it justice dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
